text:
Would be easier to have a short-cut for Enabling / Disabling (sub)tree or branches in test plan.

For now it is necessary to use mouse and right click to make it.
creator: adrian.bala@gmail.com

text:
Added Toggle command - Control+T

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1171343&view=rev
